name: Devansh Mishra
position: Analyst @Deloitte, Cloud Engineering, Mathematics and Computing, IIT Kharagpur MnC '22
about: I am a cloud technology specialist with a growing focus on machine learning, deep learning, and data science. With a solid background in data science, cloud operations and DevOps, I am now exploring the application of advanced ML/DL techniques. My strong foundation in mathematics and statistics fuels my passion for solving complex problems through data-driven approaches. I am eager to contribute to innovative projects at the intersection of technology and DevOps.
